uk.ac.ebi.pride.jmztab.utils

Class MZTabFileConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.ebi.pride.jmztab.utils.MZTabFileConverter

  • public class MZTabFileConverter
extends Object
    Convert third-party data source to mzTab file, and do whole MZTabFile consistency check. Currently, only PRIDE XML v2.1 and MZIdentML v1.0 has been integrated into this framework.
    Since:
    17/09/13
    Author:
    qingwei, ntoro
    See Also:
    MZTabInspector, MZTabCommandLine

      • MZTabFileConverter

        public MZTabFileConverter()
        Use this constructor only to check the files without convert them first. The file needs to be generated previously. This constructor will disappear in future versions.

public void check(MZTabFile mzTabFile)

        See Also:
        checkMetadata(Metadata), checkProtein(Metadata, MZTabColumnFactory), checkPeptide(Metadata, MZTabColumnFactory), checkPSM(Metadata, MZTabColumnFactory), checkSmallMolecule(Metadata, MZTabColumnFactory)
